articles.title: WhatsApp is testing a feature that lets you quietly leave groups - Engadget

articles.content: If you choose to leave a WhatsApp group that has become increasingly noisy or irrelevant, the app will post a notification that anybody can see in-chat. It's probably not a big deal in most instances… [+1314 chars]
